snippet.title: Cities: Skylines - Natural Disasters, In-game Trailer
snippet.description:
Natural Disasters will add a series of city-destroying emergencies to Cities: Skylines, which can occur unexpectedly during the game – or be manually triggered by mayors seeking a challenge or who just really dislike their citizens. 

Buildings and infrastructure will suffer untold destruction unless cities include the right emergency countermeasures, and players will have to act fast to keep things running as fire and flood sweep through town. In addition, a new Scenario Mode allows for custom challenges to be designed and shared through Steam Workshop.

Thanks to the people who built the Cities we destroyed in this trailer: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=511600672
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=511736043
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=511736043
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=511486460
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=511470722
